scripts.setup:dev: npm i && npm run build && npm run link:local && npm run link
scripts.link:local: mkdir -p cli/node_modules/@jovotech && cd cli/node_modules/@jovotech && ln -sf ../../../commands/command-build cli-command-build && ln -sf ../../../commands/command-deploy cli-command-deploy && ln -sf ../../../commands/command-get cli-command-get && ln -sf ../../../commands/command-new cli-command-new && ln -sf ../../../commands/command-run cli-command-run && ln -sf ../../../commands/command-update cli-command-update && ln -sf ../../../core cli-core
scripts.preparePublish: npm install && npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run eslint && npm run test
scripts.doPublish: npm run updateVersions && npm run publishPackages
